products.title: Trianglelab Plated Copper Compatible Volcano Nozzles 1.75mm Artillery Sidewinder
products.body_html:
All features of the T-Volcano nozzle are similar to those of the Volcano. The T-Volcano model is a perfect replacement for the Volcano nozzle. Its thread is M6. Can support PT100 Volcano BLOCK. And support all series products. The nozzle has a higher artistic value. And more advanced manufacturing processes. I hope my customers can like it.

Product Include:

  • 1x Trianglelab Plated Copper T- Volcano Compatible Nozzle

Supported Hotends:

  • Artillery Sidewinder X1
  • E3D Volcano HotEnd 1.75mm Filament
  • Tevo Little Monster

Manufacturer Information: 

  • All nozzles are manufactured by German equipment through a number of complex processes.All of our nozzles have a separate model body. Each model requires drilling on the corresponding model body. The nozzles of other companies are uniform blank bodies that are then drilled directly by drill bits of different bore sizes. Doing so can result in incorrect nozzle specifications and very large errors in accuracy, which can seriously affect the performance of the printer. 

*Durable, non-stick, high temperature performance nozzles. This copper alloy is very temperature resilient, and will not start to soften or anneal until way beyond 500°C, making it perfect for the high-temperature 3D printing that other nozzles can't handle. These nozzles are fully integrated into the Volcano hotend, DDB extruder Hotend and are compatible with Prusa 3D printers

  • These nozzles are engineered for ultimate high temperature performance. Made from a special high temperature copper-alloy with a softening point of well above 500°C, and with much-increased thermal conductivity these copper nozzles are perfect for high temperature applications, while working perfectly with everyday filaments like PLA, ABS and spoolWorks EDGE.In addition to high temperature performance these nozzles have an advanced nickel based plating, considerably reducing the adhesion of plastic to the nozzle. This is great for everyday filaments keeping things clean and shiny, but is particularly important at temperatures above 300°C where a silicone sock can't be used.
  • Copper has more than 3x the thermal conductivity of brass, and the copper alloy we use has been hardened and treated to reduce the oxidation that occurs in copper at high temperatures. The higher thermal conductivity will also slightly increase your heat-up times, and can provide tighter temperature control.
  • This copper-alloy is very temperature resilient, and will not start to soften or anneal until way beyond 500°C, making it perfect for the high-temperature printing that other nozzles can't handle.

products.title: Comptaible Ender 3 S1 / Sprite Extruder MK8 Plated Copper Nozzle
products.body_html:
This a Creality Compatible CR-6 SE Ender 3 S1 Sprite Extruder MK8 Plated Copper Nozzle is an essential item for 3D printing projects

products.title: E3D - Volcano Nozzles
products.body_html:
E3D Volcano nozzles are specifically engineered for the Volcano heater block. Whether choosing standard or extra-large diameters, they enable faster printing with thicker layers and sturdier builds. The 2.85mm Volcano nozzles are also fully compatible with the Lulzbot Moarstruder for enhanced performance.

Choose the right material:

Nozzle X

Nozzle X is the last nozzle your 3D printer will ever need. Made from a hardened tool-steel base, they are then Nickel plated to maintain hardness at elevated temperatures, and have a WS2 coating applied to provide the nozzle with reduced stick properties. Rated to a maximum temperature of 500°C, Nozzle X prints every printable material*, from PLA all the way to Carbon Fibre-filled PEEK without wearing.

Brass 

Brass nozzles, featuring E3D’s signature internal geometry, have optimal thermal properties for everyday printing, providing smooth layers for standard non-abrasive applications. Rated to a max temperature of 300°C.

ObXidian 

ObXidian offers wear resistance far exceeding that of any other E3D nozzle, making it exceptionally durable. It is significantly harder than Nozzle X and all standard hardened steel nozzles. This superior hardness comes from combining a tool steel insert with our advanced E3DLC™ coating. Additionally, this unique coating provides built-in non-stick properties, greatly reducing plastic buildup on the nozzle.

Documentation: 

Please note:

Volcano nozzles are not compatible with the V6, SuperVolcano or Cyclops heater blocks.

E3D nozzles are identifiable with markings on the flats of the hex head, please see the table below for identification.

products.title: E3D High Flow ObXidian™ Hotend With Nozzle for Bambu Lab X1/P1 Series
products.body_html:
E3D is proud to be the exclusive officially approved manufacturer of aftermarket HotEnds for Bambu Lab. Developed in partnership with Bambu Lab, these ObXidian High Flow HotEnds deliver a compact, lightweight design coupled with exceptional performance. DREMC is an authorised E3D reseller, ensuring genuine quality and support.

  • High Flow. There's no denying that the Bambu Lab X1 and P1 series printers are built for speed. However, the motion system, as remarkable as it is, has headroom to be even better. That's where E3D High Flow technology comes in. Using our internal nozzle modification, we've managed to increase the volumetric flow rate of the HotEnd by 60%! That means you can expect more reliable and consistent extrusion at the same speeds or bump up the volumetric flow rate limit in the slicer to utilise the motion systems' capabilities fully.
  • Smooth and Hard. We've applied our E3DLC™ coating to the nozzle and heater parts, adding even more abrasive resistance for all your fibre-filled fun and a non-stick protective layer to prevent plastic build-up on the Nozzle.
  • No compromise. All of these new additions come in the same form factor as your stock Bambu; simply reuse your temperature sensor and heater pads, and it drops in place with no adjustment to the mount or part cooling required.
  • Compatibility. The E3D High Flow HotEnd is compatible with the X1, X1 Carbon, P1S, and P1P.

E3D Datasheet

What is Included:

  • 1 x Bambu Lab High Flow ObXidian HotEnd 0.40 mm or 0.60mm
  • 1 x Thermal Grease
  • 1 x Bambu Lab Sock
  • 1 x Bambu Lab Heater Retaining Spring
  • 2 x Bambu Lab Bolts

Documentation:

https://support.dremc.com.au/en/support/solutions/articles/51000427574-install-an-e3d-high-flow-obxidian-hotend-on-your-bambu-lab

Avoid using 0.4mm with Galaxy/Glitter Filament, we found cht channel tend to partial clog over time on materials.

products.title: Micro Swiss NG™ Direct Drive Extruder for Creality CR-10 / Ender 3 Printers
products.body_html:
This extruder overcomes the shortcomings of all current counterparts on the market, to create an optimal printing experience for everyone.

With the Bevel Gear design, we are able to achieve the industry shortest filament path (less than 41mm). The unique motor placement allows for highly compact, low overhang design.  This further increases system rigidity. 

Features:

  • Lightweight

  • 3:1 Gear ratio

  • Adaptable to wide range of 3D Printers

  • Hardened steel, precision cut Dual Gear drive

  • Industry shortest, highly constrained, TwinClad XT™ plated filament path

  • Bevel Gear system allows a low overhang extruder mount

  • Integrated with a Micro Swiss All Metal Hotend

Made in USA by Micro Swiss

Compatible Printers:

  • CR-10
  • CR-10s
  • CR-10-S5
  • CR-10-S4
  • Ender 3
  • Ender 3 Pro
  • Ender 3 V2
  • Ender 3 V2 Neo (X Limit Switch Bracket Required)

What is Included:

  • 1x Master Extruder Assembly 
  • 1x Adaptation plate
  • 1x Stepper motor
  • 1x Fan Shroud
  • 1x Custom extension cable
  • 1x Hotend assembly

Hardware:

  • 1x Eccentric nut
  • 1x M5 x .8 x 30mm CAP SCREW
  • 1x 5mm ID 10mm OD Washer
  • 1x M5 x .8 Nylon Lock Nut
  • 2x M5 x .8 x 20mm Nylon Patch CAP SCREWs
  • 4x M2.2 x 8mm Thread Forming Screw for Plastic
  • 4x M3 x 12mm Thread Forming Screw for Plastic
  • 1x 7mm spanner wrench

Resources:

  • Printable shrouds and brackets
  • g-code for e-step
  • STEP File

PDF:
Installation Instructions - PDF

Video Guides:

By Daniel at ModBot

By John at Tripod’s Garage

By Chris at Chris's Basement

By Chris at Embrace Making

products.title: Mosquito® Silicone Boot Sock
products.body_html:
At long last, there is an official silicone boot for the Mosquito. And yes, it is a boot, not a sock. Socks can be flimsy, fall off, and tear easily. Boots are there for you when the rubber meets the road (see what we did there?), providing long lasting protection from cooling air and plastic adhesion. 

The Mosquito Silicone Boot is:

  • Made from high grade silicone for higher temperature resistance
  • Thickly molded with internal air cavities to ensure optimal thermal insulation and tear resistance
  • Rated to 290 °C printing temperatures
  • Spring loaded to keep the boot hooked onto the hot block at all times
  • Endowed with easy to use finger grips to aid in installation and removal 
  • Coated with a clear coating for maximum plastic repellent power

Protect your hotend investment with the Mosquito Silicone Boot

Fits Mosquito and Mosquito Magnum hotends.

products.title: Panda Brush PX / Purge Shield For Bambu X1/P1
products.body_html:
Panda Brush PX

Clean Nozzle, Clean Prints

Maintains nozzle cleanliness by effectively removing filament residue, safeguarding print quality and preventing colour bleed between materials. A purge brush essential for achieving consistent, contamination-free results on Bambu X1 and P1 systems.

Tool-Free, Snap-On Installation

  • The Panda Brush PX locks in with a satisfying snap—no screws, no fuss, no wobble, just instant, rock-solid reliability.
  • Precision CNC Aluminium
  • Heat-resistant silicon

Features: 

Easy Installation

  • Remove the original wiper.
  • Push to install firmly—no screws needed.
  • Done. 

Modified Wipe G-code for improve reliability: https://github.com/jaeitee/bqwipe (Credit: Jaeitee)

Specifications

  • Material: Aluminum Alloy + Silicone
  • Process: CNC Precision Machined
  • Compatibility: For Bambu Lab P1P, P1S, X1C, X1E 


Panda Purge Shield

No More Clogs.No More Chaos.

The nano-coated polymer construction resists filament adhesion, enabling smooth waste ejection and reliable multi-material printing without interruption. Engineered for Bambu X1 and P1 users seeking dependable purge performance across extended print sessions.

Features:

60-Second Upgrade

  • Prep It: Remove the old pad from the front of the waste chute.
  • Degrease the chute(an alcohol wipe works well).
  • Stick It: Peel off the adhesive backing and align the Panda Purge Shield to the chute front, pressing firmly into place.
  • Bling It: Apply metallic sticker, peel off the transfer film,enjoy.

Specifications

  • Material: SUS304, Nano Polymer Coating
  • Compatibility: For Bambu Lab P1P, P1S, X1C, X1E

products.title: Bondtech CHT BiMetal MK8 Coated Nozzle - Hardened Vanadium Steel
products.body_html:
Bondtech's CHT BiMetal nozzle delivers enhanced thermal conductivity to accelerate print speeds without compromising quality. The hardened vanadium steel construction resists wear from abrasive and fibre-loaded filaments, extending nozzle lifespan. Improved heat distribution strengthens layer adhesion, resulting in more durable parts with superior surface finish. 

Copper and Hardened Vanadium Steel nozzle for high flow applications with abrasive materials.

Nozzle is supplied with Nickel Coating. [First Photo is how nozzle looks before coating, second photo is actual nozzle appearance after coating]

Increase the Max Volumetric Flow of your MK8 style heat block by 50%

Compatibility: 

They are manufactured by Bondtech in-house, and will fit the following blocks/printers:

  • bq Hephestos
  • Hephestos 2
  • bq Prusa i3 Hephestos
  • bq Witbox
  • bq Witbox 2
  • Creality CR-10
  • Creality CR-10-S4
  • Creality CR-10-S5
  • Creality CR-10S
  • MakerBot Replicator
  • MakerBot Replicator 2
  • MakerBot Replicator 2X
  • Creality Ender 2
  • Creality Ender 3 Pro
  • Creality CR-20 Pro
  • Creality Ender 5
  • Craftbot family
  • Creality CR-10 V2
  • Creality CR-6 SE
  • Creality CR-10 Smart
  • Tevo Tornado

Documentation:

ALERT : Avoid Cold Change Of Bondtech CHT Nozzles

Heat up the heat block up to 280C, or at least above 250C, before removing or tightening any Bondtech CHT nozzle. Use at most 1 Nm torque. Recommended Torque is 0.5 Nm.

ALERT : Size limitation for fiber loaded filaments

For Carbon or Glass fiber loaded abrasive filaments use only 0.6, 0.8 and 1.0mm nozzle size.

ALERT : For particle loaded filaments

For metal, wood, glitter or other particle loaded abrasive filaments you may use the 0.4mm nozzle size.

Specification: 

  • Copper body;Hardened Vanadium Steel inserts
  • Nickel Coating;1 unit per pack or 4x pack (1x 0.40; 1x 0.60; 1x 0.80; 1x 1.0mm)
  • Available sizes : 0.40, 0.60, 0.80, and 1.0mm
  • Optimised for 1.75mm filament
  • Compatible with 2.85mm filament.
  • Requires 6mm wrench

Features

Bondtech CHT BiMetal MK8 Coated Nozzle Advantages

  • Abrasive-proof to work with Carbon and Glass fiber composite materials;
  • Higher melt capacity by increasing the surface area of the heating walls
  • Flow Rate gains between 25 and 65% (check picture with test data)
  • Competitive price/performance price
  • Machined with ultra-precision
  • Copper body and Hardened Vanadium Steel inserts nozzle with Nickel coated surface
  • Follows nozzle standard:
    • MK8 (M6×1×5×13)
  • May be used with 1.75 or 2.85mm hotends.

Flow Rate gains may vary. Results depend on the hardware, materials and print settings used.

products.title: Bigtreetech BTT SKR V1.4  Motherboard For 3D Printer
products.body_html:
Features:

  • Using 32-bit 100MHz ARM-class Cortex-M3 series LPC1768 main control chip, the performance is greatly improved.
  • Note: Avoid moving printer axis or the stepper motor by hand when system is off, this can cause issues with 5V regulation back feeding and is not covered under warranty, as this can affect some stepper module drivers, newer driver may have protection built in, but some does not.
  • Equipped with highly modular open source firmware Marlin 2.0, which is convenient for users to DIY and secondary development. Support Klippers
  • Support 2.4, 2.8, 3.5-inch color touch screen, support LCD2004 screen, LCD12864 screen; Upgrade configuration firmware through SD card, simple, convenient and efficient operation.
  • It can supply power to TFT screen, BLtouch, Neo-pixel by plugging in an external DC5V power module; in addition, I2C, SPI, WIFI interface is reserved to facilitate customer DIY.
  • On-board TMC driver SPI working mode and UART working mode, and the on-board DIAG function pins are convenient for customers to use, eliminating the complicated wiring process, which can be used by simply removing and inserting the jumper cap; Functions such as continuous power on, material detection, shutdown after power off.

Documentation:

  • Github: https://github.com/bigtreetech/BIGTREETECH-SKR-V1.3/tree/master/BTT%20SKR%20V1.4

  4. Designed to withstand high temperatures, this upgrade is perfectly suited for the rigorous conditions of 3D printing.

products.title: LDO Box Turtle Hardware Kit
products.body_html:
BoxTurtle is exactly what it appears to be — an open source AMS style filament changer for Klipper machines. BoxTurtle requires the AFC-Klipper Add-On (found here). The goal of BoxTurtle is to deliver a user experience as close to an AMS as possible in vanilla Klipper. i.e. an "AMS" for any klipperized printer regardless of form factor but VORON Design printers in particular.

Printed parts are not included. Kit includes the stock BOM, which may lack certain items, such as the bottom panel. You can find printed part files on the GitHub resource below.

For printed parts, please contact us for lead time and availability; pricing is approximately $380–400, around $300 without the tray printed parts (Injected Moulded Tray available on request from LDO for $20) 

From the official GitHub / Bom

Features 

LDO BoxTrutle (LBT) is totally based on BoxTurtle original design, added some useful extras. Main features:

  • Smooth and powerful LDO pancake motors
  • Come with AFC-Lite board
  • Premium Anodised Extrusions for frame
  • Omron D2HW switch for filament sensor
  • Pre-crimped cables included
  • MJF Printed PA12 Gears for respooler
  • Hard Mount Hardware included

Extras: 

  • Turtle Neck Buffer (TN) parts kit included
  • Filametrix parts included

Documentation: 

You can find more details on Armored Turtle GitHub: https://github.com/ArmoredTurtle/BoxTurtle

Assembly Manual Here: https://armoredturtle.xyz/


Past Production Batch Pre-Order Information:

 

Note: After Batch 3, we order based on demand, subscribed restock or contact us if you're interested in colour/frame that is not in stock. As we order based on demand. We will update the "Batch Revision if there has been hardware revision or changes, otherwise these on demand batches will marked without batch number) 

 

Preorder Info (Batch 3): Closed/Sold OUT. This batch is scheduled to ship from LDO in late March 2025 and is expected to arrive at our location around mid-to-late May 2025.

Preorder info(Batch 2) - SOLD OUT: these are expected to ship out by Late of January 2025 and arrive to our location around Early-mid March 2025. 

Preorder info(Batch 1) - SOLD OUT: these are dispatched early January 2025 and arrive to our location around Mid-Late February 2025. (We have included Rubber+Feet for all Batch 1 Orders/Kits - Shipped)

products.title: Omron Solid State Relay (SSR) G3NB-220B-1-DC5-24
products.body_html:
Omron G3NB-220B-1-DC5-24 unit is a solid-state AC output relay with a maximum output of 240V/20A. The G3NA-210B-DC5-24 is UL certified, CSA certified, and TÜV, Australian RMC compliant.

The G3NB-220B-1-DC5-24 is rated for input voltages of 5V to 24V, while a built-in varistor absorbs external surges and an operation indicator allows monitoring operation.

products.title: Gates Powergrip® RF 2GT Belt for Creality Printers - CR10 Series
products.body_html:
Replacement Pre-Crimped Belts for Creality CR10 Series 3D Printers, using Gates PowerGrip RF for improve reliability, pre-cut to length and terminated with custom copper ferrules for plug and play replacement. 

Why choose Gates RF belts

  • Their special 3-ply construction gives the best of all worlds: the nylon tooth facing material increases lubricity of the belt surface, fiberglass tensile cord adds exceptional strength and resistance to stretching, and a neoprene body ensures a supple and flexible surface that won't crack or deform, even in high heat printers. RF has dust proof coating on belt to improve longevity, especially in Australia. 

If you don't see your belt here and need a specific length, please open a support ticket and we'll be happy to assist or check our other product collection for other printer models. 

Specification: 

  • Belt Materials Gates LL-2GT-6 RF
  • The length varies according to the chosen option and is indicated in the SKU—for example, the length is highlighted in bold in LL-2GT-6-RF-935.

Compatibility Note: 

Depending on your selection

Printers: 

  • CR10 Series [List of Supported Printers]

    • CR-X
    • CR-X V2
    • CR-X Pro
    • CR-10s Pro V2
    • CR-10s Pro

Note 1: Depending on length, gates label may not be present on pre-crimped belt as label only appear every 1500mm. Our belts are cut roughly 1-2 mm longer compare to Creality specs. Copper sleeves as shown in product photo may vary between batches.

Additional Advance Belt Tension Guide: https://support.dremc.com.au/en/support/solutions/articles/51000433869-belt-tension-guide

products.body_html:
This Micro Swiss plated heater block upgrade is built from a high-temperature Copper Chromium Zirconium that allows you to reach temperatures up to 500°C. This special alloy retains its strength at much higher temperatures compared to a regular copper alloy. It is compatible with 100K thermistor, cartridge-style thermistors, thermocouple, PT100 and PT1000 sensors.

Threads size: M6

Block dimensions: 21mm x 20mm x 10mm

Made in USA by Micro Swiss

products.title: Micro Swiss FlowTech™ Hotend for Creality Ender 3 V3 KE
products.body_html:
The FlowTech™ Hotend is a new generation hotend line from Micro Swiss. Its unique design eliminates common hotend issues such as leaking nozzle seal and complex nozzle swaps.

Keeping with our philosophy, the FlowTech hotend is designed to be an easy drop-in upgrade for each 3D printer model. This edition is designed for Ender 3 V3 KE. Stock z-height, build volume and firmware remains unchanged.

Features:

  • Leak-Proof Nozzle:
    Tired of messy nozzle leaks that ruin your prints and waste filament? FlowTech Hotend combines nozzle and thermal break into one permanently sealed assembly that ensures a leak-proof hotend.

  • Cold Nozzle Change:
    Swapping out nozzles used to be a time-consuming and potentially hazardous task. With a FlowTech Hotend, nozzle changes are effortless, and there's no need for hot tightening, and you can do it with just one hand.

  • High-Flow Characteristics:
    Ceramic cylindrical heater and 28.6mm melt zone provides excellent volumetric flow rate.

  • All-Metal Design:
    Built to last! FlowTech hotend features an all-metal design that can handle most modern 3D printing filaments. The entire hotend is machined and assembled in-house, with quality control performed at multiple stages during the manufacturing process. At the end, each hotend undergoes a full thermal cycling test before it is packaged.

  • 300°C Max Temperature:
    This hotend is rated at 300°C temperature with a properly tuned NTC thermistor for each specific printer. This particular edition is perfectly tuned for Ender 3 V3 KE so no firmware changes are needed.

Made in USA by Micro Swiss

Supported Device:

  • Creality Ender 3 V3 KE

What is Included:

  • 1x FlowTech™ Heater Core 
  • 1x Copper Thermal Adapter
  • 1x FlowTech™ Brass Plated 0.4mm Nozzle
  • 2x Titanium Mounting Screws
  • 1x Silicon Sock

Documentation:

PDF:
Installation Instructions - PDF

products.title: Thermal Fuse – 125c 15A
products.body_html:
This thermal fuse activates at 125°C and supports up to 15A, serving as a safety device to prevent overheating in AC heated beds. It acts as a reliable fail safe to avoid fire risks caused by heat element malfunctions.


Fuse Specification: 

  • Rated Temperature: 125c
  • Trigger “Fusing” Temperature: 145 ± 2c
  • Continuous operating temperature: 120c
  • Rated Current: 15A
  • Rated Voltage: 250VAC
  • Ceramic Casing
  • Suitable for Voron AC Heated Beds

All fuse are batch tested.

products.title: Slice Engineering Nozzle Torque Wrench™: 1.5 Nm
products.body_html:
Achieve consistent nozzle installation with this precision torque wrench, calibrated to 1.5 Nm for optimal sealing without over-tightening. Designed for Slice Engineering nozzles with adapter compatibility for alternative styles, it eliminates guesswork during maintenance and reduces the risk of thermal leaks that compromise print quality. An essential tool for operators who demand reliability across extended print runs.

  • Specifically designed for changing nozzles (for 7mm or 6mm) 

  • 1.5 Nm torque provides correct seal to prevent leaking plastic

  • Perfect tool for one-handed nozzle change when paired with Mosquito® hotends

  • Fits any Slice Engineering nozzles natively, with just enough wiggle room for that baked on plastic

  • Fits other style nozzles with off-the-shelf adapters

  • Made in Taiwan, packaged in USA. 

Product Includes:

  • Nozzle Torque Wrench
  • Adapter (7 mm (9/32") hex)

Built to better than Prusa OEM specifications(high grade precision), it ensures reliable part compatibility and consistent print quality.

Bulk Discount 10+ 15% off

products.title: Aftermarket Hotend kit for Creality Ender 3 V3 SE
products.body_html:
Aftermarket hotend assembly for Creality Ender 3 V3 SE featuring enhancements such as an all-metal heat break and your choice of plated copper or hardened nozzle, providing a superior wear resistance and remove consumable PTFE for heat break. 

What is Included: 

All kits include sock and respective thermistors [Does not include hotend retaining bolts]

If you need retaining m2x12 bolt, sold here: https://store.dremc.com.au/products/m2-stainless-steel-socket-head-cap-screw-shsc

All Metal Kit(Abrasive option): Hardened Steel Nozzle (Titanium Alloy Heat break)

  • Hardened steel nozzle 0.4mm
  • 24V 40W Heater
  • Titanium Alloy Heat Break

All Metal Kit(Non abrasive option): Chrome Copper + Titanium Alloy (All Metal Heat Break)

  • Copper Plated Nozzle 0.4mm
  • 24V 40W Heater
  • Copper + Titanium Alloy Heat Break

Standard Kit(Stock): Brass Nozzle (PTFE LINED Heat break) (EOL)

See Stock Hotend Here: https://store.dremc.com.au/products/original-creality-hotend-kit-for-ender-3-v3-se

  • Brass Nozzle 0.4mm
  • 24V  40W Heater
  • Stainless Steel + PTFE Lined Heat Break

 Support Printers/Upgrades Kits

  • Ender 3 V3 SE

Documentation

[How to change nozzle]: https://support.dremc.com.au/en/support/solutions/articles/51000318231-how-to-hot-tighten-nozzle-change-a-nozzle

We do recommenced you re-tighten nozzle again, you need to re-tightened at +10-20c your regular printing temperature or max 260-270c. You may need compile your own firmware to support higher printing temperature or within your klipper configuration update max temperature. 

Which one should I choose? For regular PLA/PETG printing, we suggest the PTFE(stock) or the Bi Metal heat break, for abrasive and higher temperature material with higher glass transition temperature we suggest the Titanium heat break to reduce the likelihood of heat creep. If you're printing in a enclosure, please ensure open front door or have enough exhaust fan working to lower the ambient chamber temperature to prevent heat creep.

What do I need do when after install? You may need to update or make change to you're printing profile due change nozzle material type and heat break type. This could mean lower/adjustment to retraction and printing temperature and speed. You will also need to perform PID auto tune on the hotend, and precaution we recommend hot tighten the nozzle at <1.5nm. We also recommend adjust your z-off set and re-run wizard/re-level bed or do calibration "on". [Documentation: https://support.dremc.com.au/en/support/solutions/articles/51000266870-pid-calibration]

What about max temperature? Due to the stock software is firmware lock at 260c, the non PTFE/stainless steel hotend is suitable up to 280c with sock, max 300c without sock.

products.title: Bondtech OEM RIDGA V2 for Mini Sherpa
products.body_html:
A very solid, reliable and improved solution from Bondtech that provides a slight improvement to the print surface quality.

Designed for the following Open Source extruders:

  • HextrudORT;
  • Sherpa Mini;
  • Voron Mini StealthBurner.

When adapting this piece of hardware into your design, make sure to allow for a bit of axial play in both directions, in order for the filament path to retain some level of self-correction.
The bearing facing the motor face should have about 0.4 mm of material between it and the motor face in order for the plastic gear to retain as much engagement as possible.
Please contact us if you have further questions regarding integrations.

It must be used with 5x8x2.5 mm ball bearings (INCLUDED).

This RIDGA, Reverse Integrated Drive Gear Assembly, replaces the following mini drive train items:

  • Main shaft;
  • Main gear;
  • Set screw;
  • Primary drive gear.

Technical Specification

  • Shaft length: 26.6 +0/-0.05mm
  • Shaft length to support ball bearings : drive side < 2.8mm - 2.6mm > Dual Gear side
  • Filament teeth’s center to end of shaft : drive side < 13.8mm - 12.8mm > Dual Gear side
  • Number of drive gear teeth : 17
  • Drive gear teeth length : 4mm
  • Integrated drive gear Material: Hardened Steel
    Materials Compatibility:
    • Flexible : yes;
    • Rigid : yes;
    • Abrasive : yes.
  • Number of main gear teeth : 50
  • Main gear teeth length : 3mm

products.title: BERSERKER VINDR Ultra-Performance 5015 Blower Fan 24V 5015B-24V-A 50x15mm
products.body_html:
A high RPM 5015 Blower Fan from West3D. 

Manufacturer Information: 

Taking inspiration from two thousand years of viking shipbuilding, which when aided by strong vindr were the fastest in the world,  BERSERKER - the brand representing unparalleled quality introduces its newest line of 3D printer components, Vindr (Norse for "Wind") Fans.

These fans were diligently sourced and each fan in the lineup have been tested to outperform any readily available fan on the market today (this fan performed 35% better than the performance fan West3D tested). These are designed to withstand high temperature environments, with an Insulation Class F rating (155C).

Fan Specification:

[Note: We are only stocking PWM version]

  • Current: DC
  • Voltage: 24V
  • Amps: .13A
  • CFM: 6.1
  • Max Static Pressure: 39.97 MmH20
  • Bearing: Dual Ball
  • Wire: 2-wire 300mm length
  • Speed: 8500 RPM +/-10%
  • Insulation Class: F (155C)

Please note, with all fans, the longer you operate in a high temperature environment, the higher the wear and shorter the life is expected.

Documentation: 

For applications like Stealthburner, the housing of our fans may need to be sanded to remove some thickness from the shell (our casing is heavier duty than generic 5015 fans). You'll be happy you did.

Durable materials, the Orbiter v2.5 offers long-lasting performance and smooth operation, making it an essential upgrade for professionals seeking precise filament control and superior print results.

products.title: Bondtech CHT BiMetal Vol Coated Nozzle - Hardened Vanadium Steel
products.body_html:
This Bondtech CHT BiMetal ™ VOLcano nozzle increases the melting capacity of your hotend, to build faster and to save your time. It also improves the layer adhesion of your 3D prints to create stronger parts. Important to notice this nozzle is resistant to particle or fiber loaded abrasive materials.

These are nozzles for High Flow applications

They are manufactured by Bondtech in-house,
and will fit the following blocks/printers:

  • E3D Volcano blocks
  • Other Volcano type blocks
  • Artillery Sidewinder X1 and X2
  • Anycubic Vyper
  • Creality K1
  • FLSUN Super Racer
  • Artillery Genius Pro
  • Anycubic Kobra and Kobra Max
  • Lulzbot TAZ MOARstruder
  • Others compatible with Volcano…


ALERT : Avoid Cold Change Of Bondtech CHT Nozzles

Heat up the heat block up to 280C, or at least above 250C, before removing or tightening any Bondtech CHT nozzle. Use at most 1 Nm torque. Recommended Torque is 0.5 Nm.

ALERT : Size limitation for fiber loaded filaments

For Carbon or Glass fiber loaded abrasive filaments use only 0.6, 0.8 and 1.0mm nozzle size.

ALERT : For particle loaded filaments

For metal, wood, glitter or other particle loaded abrasive filaments you may use the 0.4mm nozzle size.

What is Included

(1 Pack)

  • 1 unit per pack;
  • Available sizes : 0.40, 0.60, 0.80, 1.0, and 1.2mm;

(5 Pack)

  • 5 units per pack;
  • Includes the following sizes : 0.4, 0.6, 0.8, 1.0, and 1.2mm;

Check the White Paper:

"Increasing Melt Capacity With 3 Nozzle Features"

Main Bondtech CHT® Advantages

  • Higher melt capacity by increasing the surface area of the heating walls
  • Affordable price
  • Machined with ultra-precision
  • Brass nozzle with Nickel coated surface
  • Follows nozzle standard:
    • Volcano (M6×1×14.5×21)
  • May be used with 1.75 or 2.85mm hotends.
  • Optimized for 1.75mm filament;
  • Compatible with 2.85mm filament.
  • Requires 6mm wrench

Advantages of the Bondtech CHT® technology:

Bondtech CHT® nozzles split the filament into 3 thinner strands allowing to melt the material from within. In doing so, the material melts faster and higher flow rates can be used.

Core Heating is a patented technology

Registration number: EP3445568A1
Nozzles for 3D printers made of metal with at least one or a multitude of holes to increase the surface area of the heating walls.

Advantages of the Nickel Coating

A Nickel coating is applied to our Coated Brass nozzles to provide protection against corrosion, erosion, and abrasion. Nickel coated nozzles have more corrosion resistance and lower coefficient of friction, which allows slicker feeding of material and delays plastic adhesion to the nozzle's surface.


Recommended Materials

Use this nozzle with the following materials:

  • PLA
  • ABS
  • HIPS
  • PC
  • TPU
  • TPE
  • Nylon
  • PETG
  • ASA
  • PP
  • PVA

For technical and abrasive materials we recommend to use other nozzles in our range.

Different nozzle sets for different materials

We recommend you to have several sets of nozzles because:
Using different materials with the same nozzles causes deposit build-up inside the nozzle.
These deposits will cause blockages.
We recommend changing nozzles when changing materials.

products.title: ANTCLABS BLTouch : Auto Bed Leveling Sensor V3.1
products.body_html:
BLTouch use a hall sensor that accurately measures 3D printer bed tilt for precise bed leveling.

It could work with any kinds of bed materials, such as glasses, woods, metals, and so on. BLTouch is fulfilled with simple structure and high precision by using progressively designed solenoid and hall sensors.

It aims for user convenience and enjoyable printing by adding many smart functions, such as self-test, alarm, alarm release & Touch Switch mode, Blue LED for servo signal indicating, and Z-probe(Zmin) Testing.

Smart Technology:

  • Self-test: The push pin operate two times in a test when the power is on.
  • Alarm: The AI will flash the LED indicator if a problem is detected during a self-test or operation.
  • Wiring defect indicator : Blue and Red LED for indicating wiring defects.

What is Included:

  • Latest BL TOUCH Sensor V3.1

Note: Sourced from BIQU. 

Documentation: 

https://www.antclabs.com/manual

Warning: Electronic devices can be damaged or destroyed if connected to the wrong side polarity. Check your polarity before plugging smart sensor in. 

Note: An additional power supply may be needed if your board does not supply enough current at 5V. Depending on your type of 3D Printer, you may need to remove or add some parts to the controller board. Check with your printer manufacturer prior to purchase.

Install Video:

Features：

The main functions and controls of BLTouch are the same as the usual auto bed leveling sensor, which consists of an RC servo and microswitch. Thus, BLTouch can be applied on almost every board.

  • Self-test： The push pin operates two times in a test when the power is on.
  • Alarm：The LED light blinks if a problem was found on a self-test or during operation
  • Wiring defect indicator：Blue and Red LED for indicating wiring defects.
  • Easy to Use: This auto bed leveling sensor makes it easier to level the hotbed, which can precisely measure the tilt of the Bed surface. Bed leveling is not a problem anymore.
  • Intelligence self - check and alarm: The function of auto leveling is adopted to make it easier to use and to increase the success rate of shaping.
